companyName: First Trust Lunt U.S. Factor Rotation
description:
The investment seeks investment results that correspond generally to the price and yield (before the fund's fees and expenses) of an equity index called the Lunt Capital Large Cap Factor Rotation Index (the "index").
 The fund will normally invest at least 90% of its net assets (including investment borrowings) in common stocks that comprise the index. The index is designed to provide exposure to U.S. large cap equities grouped into four separate factors, with factors emphasized within the index as they come into favor in the U.S. marketplace. The fund is non-diversified.
